```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#generate data
set.seed(124)
n <- 16
p_C <- 1/5
C <- rbinom(n,1,p_C)
theta0 <- 1/2
theta1 <- -1/5
p_A <- theta0+theta1*C
A <- rbinom(n,1,p_A)
beta0 <- 110
beta1 <- 20
beta2 <- 5
sigma_Y <- 1
mu_Y <- beta0+beta1*C+beta2*A
Y <- rnorm(n,mu_Y, sigma_Y)

# create dataframe
library(tidyverse)
df = cbind(A, C, Y) %>% 
  as.data.frame()
```
